task.title: SOLID
task.shortdesc: With the Plane tool, you can draw rectangular, triangular, or quadrilateral areas filled with a solid color. The default method is to specify the corners of the plane. After you specify the first two corners, the plane is displayed as you specify the remaining corners. The program prompts you for the third point and then the fourth point.

step.cmd: Choose Draw > Surfaces > 2D Solid from the mainmenu.
To complete the command, press Enter.

result.p: After you select the first two points (A) and (B), the sequence in which you select the third (C) and fourth (D) points determines the shape of the resulting quadrilateral plane.
